content.text: Thanks! I celebrated with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
That sounds like fun! I was a musician before my current job.
Cool! What kind of music did you play?
I played guitar in a rock band.
That's awesome! I'm not really musical, but I enjoy playing guitar hero.
I feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself.
I feel the same way. I take long walks in the park to clear my head and relax.
That's a great way to relax. I enjoy water skiing, but I feel like I need to find something else to do.
I don't dye my hair. I'm not really concerned with my appearance, I'm much more interested in creating and expressing myself.
That's cool. I like to keep my hair short. I'm not really into fashion.
Me neither. I'm more interested in creating things.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're happy with your life.
Thanks! I hope you're happy with your life, too.
